core

Class Behavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Behavior
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AfterWork, EventNotify, EventStore, Introduction, WaifuMenuBehavior

    public abstract class Behavior
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for concrete behaviors.
    Author:
    csiki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AI ai
      The one who let behaviors prevail.
      private java.lang.String name
      Name of the behavior.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Behavior(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor of a behavior.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void actionPerformed(UserAction userAction)
      This method is called, when a user action is created, activated with the actual behavior passed and the user action gone off.
      abstract void condition(UserActionFactory UAF)
      Contains the "condition" for the "consequent" to run.
      protected void conditionFulfilled()
      This method should be called if (all) condition is fulfilled, and the behavior would like to signal that the consequent should run.
      abstract void consequent(CounterActionFactory CAF)
      The "consequent" sequence of program, that would run if the "condition" part is fulfilled, and the AI let it to do so.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the behavior.
      void provideAI(AI ai)
      Provide an instance of the AI to the behavior, to be able to call it.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Name of the behavior. Later will have meaning by having the possibility to turn on/off exact behaviors.

      • ai

        private AI ai
        The one who let behaviors prevail.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Behavior

        public Behavior(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor of a behavior. Sets behaviors name. That's why when Behavior is extended by a subclass, in the subclass constructor super("behavior_name") must be called.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the behavior

    • Method Detail

      • condition

        public abstract void condition(UserActionFactory UAF)
        Contains the "condition" for the "consequent" to run. The place where user actions should be created and activated.
        Parameters:
        UAF - UserActionFactory instance is passed, so user actions can be created here.

      • actionPerformed

        public abstract void actionPerformed(UserAction userAction)
        This method is called, when a user action is created, activated with the actual behavior passed and the user action gone off.
        Parameters:
        userAction - the user action that has gone off, and now notifies the actual behavior.

      • consequent

        public abstract void consequent(CounterActionFactory CAF)
        The "consequent" sequence of program, that would run if the "condition" part is fulfilled, and the AI let it to do so.
        Parameters:
        CAF - CounterActionFactory instance is passed, so counter actions can be created here.

      • conditionFulfilled

        protected final void conditionFulfilled()
        This method should be called if (all) condition is fulfilled, and the behavior would like to signal that the consequent should run.

      • getName

        public final java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the behavior.
        Returns:
        name of the behavior.

      • provideAI

        public final void provideAI(AI ai)
        Provide an instance of the AI to the behavior, to be able to call it. Should NOT be called by the behavior itself.
        Parameters:
        ai -
